original_text: And as Jesus was going up to Jerusalem, he took the twelve disciples aside, and on the way he said to them,
korean_text: 예수께서 예루살렘으로 올라가려 하실 때에 열두 제자를 따로 데리시고 길에서 이르시되

sentences.original_text: And as Jesus was going up to Jerusalem,
he took the twelve disciples aside,
and on the way he said to them,
